metadata.title: CVE-2018-19962 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x on AMD x86 platforms,possibly allowing guest OS users to gain host OS privileges because smallIOMMU mappings are unsafely combined into larger ones.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
